description: Repeatedly convert from decimal to octal!.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..75
prog: (Haskell)a008557 n = a008557_list !! (n-1)a008557_list = iterate a007094 8  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 29 2013
